```{r}
library(ape)
library(seqinr)
library(tidysq)
library(Biostrings)

dna <- paste(sample(c("C", "T", "A", "G"), 100000, replace = TRUE), collapse = "")

sq <- list(4)

# tidysq:
sq[[1]] <- clean(construct_sq(dna, type = "nuc"))

# seqinr:
sq[[2]] <- as.SeqFastadna(s2c(dna))

# ape:
sq[[3]] <- as.DNAbin(s2c(dna))

# Biostrings:
sq[[4]] <- DNAStringSet(dna)

name <- c("tidysq", "seqinr", "ape", "Biostrings")
sizes <- sapply(sq, object.size)

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data.frame(names = name, sizes = sizes), aes(x = name, y = sizes)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")

```
